title: Sleeping Murder
description: Soon after Gwenda and husband moved into a new home, odd things started to happen. Despite her best efforts to modernize the house, she only succeeded in dredging up its past. Worse, she felt an irrational sense of something murderous every time she climbed the stairs. In her fear, Gwenda turned to Miss Marple and a "perfect" crime committed many years before is solved.
author: Agatha Christie
